Class LakeTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.LakeTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LakeTile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Lake tile is a card to place to the game After that player can get lantern cards following the direction of the placed lake tile.
    Author:
    none

        Constructor of a lake tile Generate a lake tile with random color for each sides
        Parameters:
        index - Id of the Lake Tile
        c1 - color represented at a side1
        c2 - color represented at a side2
        c3 - color represented at a side3
        c4 - color represented at a side4
        platform - if a platform is available on the lake tile or not
